Notes.Text:
This update for liblouis fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-26981: fix buffer overrun in compilePassOpcode (bsc#1197085).
- CVE-2022-31783: prevent an invalid memory write in compileRule (bsc#1200120).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: Liblouis through 3.21.0 has a buffer overflow in compilePassOpcode in compileTranslationTable.c (called, indirectly, by tools/lou_checktable.c).
